thread.title: Listen: Did Slash Write The 'Chinese Democracy' Riff... In 1988? [News]
thread.title_full: Listen: Did Slash Write The 'Chinese Democracy' Riff... In 1988? [News]

title: Listen: Did Slash Write The 'Chinese Democracy' Riff... In 1988? [News]
text:
Posted a day ago 9 
A Guns N' Roses fan behind the alias of Remcognr made an interesting discovery, linking the riff to 2008's " Chinese Democracy " track to a live intro to " Welcome to the Jungle " Slash played way back in 1988. 
The fan noted: "'Chinese Democracy' in 1988?! What sounds like a Slash guitar intro from one of the recent shows, is actually the introduction solo to 'Welcome to the Jungle' from the Tokyo December 10th, 1988 show! Discovered it recently, but this really sounds like the opening riff of 'Chinese Democracy' to me. Please take a listen." 
You can take a listen to the both tracks below. A post shared by Guns N' Roses Collection (@remcognr) on Feb 25, 2017 at 2:08pm PST
